Jupiter: The Planet, Satellites and Magnetosphere by Fran Bagenal
Jupiter by Isaac Asimov
Jupiter by Lynn Lasseter Drake
Jupiter: studies of the interior, atmosphere, magnetosphere, and satellites by Tom Gehrels
Jupiter by Margaret J. Goldstein
Jupiter by Rosanna Hansen
Jupiter: The Largest Planet by Daisy Allyn
Jupiter: king of the gods, giant of the planets by Franklyn Mansfield Branley
Jupiter by Derek Zobel
